screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ttd file in Tinytag Explorer
screenshot.caption: TTD file open in Tinytag Explorer

description: Tinytag Explorer is used in a variety of fields, including environmental research, manufacturing, museums and galleries, food preparation, storage, and transportation, laboratories, and facilities efficiency management. The program allows users to interface with the Tinytag data loggers that are collecting data.

Tinytag Explorer can be used to combine data recorded by one or more data loggers and export data to .TXT , .CSV , .XLS , and .XML files. The program can also be used to visualize data as graphs and export them to .PNG and .BMP images.
